title: Krisiun - Forged In Fury (Limited Edition) (2015)320ak
description:
KRISIUN's new album, Forged In Fury is available now worldwide via Century Media Records as a limited edition digipak which includes two bonus tracks as well as a woven patch. The release is also available in a 180g gatefold 2 LP edition with etching (incl. the album on CD) and as a digital download. 

 

The band has also launched the second track "Ways Of Barbarism," from Forged In Fury in the form of a new lyric video. 
 

Press reactions to Forged In Fury have been outrageously positive, with Metal Hammer (UK) stating that the "Brazilian berserkers hit a career peak. Here lies the difference between followers and leaders. Krisiun always belonged to the second category and it's never been truer than in 2015."

Forged In Fury was produced by Erik Rutan, the brain and heart of death metal masters HATE ETERNAL and former guitarist of MORBID ANGEL. Rutan has worked as a producer for his own band as well as for CANNIBAL CORPSE, SIX FEET UNDER, MALEVOLENT CREATION, MADBALL, AGNOSTIC FRONT, to name just a few-- additionally, he also co-produced KRISIUN's Conquerors of Armageddon album back in 1999!


The stunning cover artwork was created by renowned artist Joe Petagno (MOTORHEAD, MARDUK, VADER, etc.).

Genre: Death Metal
Origin: Brazil
Size/Quality: 122 mb / | Mp3, CBR 320 kbps
